name: Jay & Silent Bob Do "Degrassi" Ep. "West End Girls Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What sport was being practiced in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Cheerleading.

	Paige and Manny, two of the main characters, were on the cheer squad. Manny and Page didn't get along at that point in the series. They were prepping for the end of school party.

questions.text: What was the Degrassi Community School mascot?
questions.explanation:
Panther.

	The Panther logo is all over the school. J.T. can be seen wearing the mascot outfit in the opening credits. The mascot was a carryover from the original "Degrassi" series.  Manny was forced by Paige to play the mascot during the year-end ceremony.

questions.text: What was the name of the movie Kevin Smith was making in Canada?
questions.correct: Jay & Silent Bob Go Canadian, Eh
questions.explanation:
Jay & Silent Bob Go Canadian, Eh.

	Kevin Smith and Jason Mewes both played versions of themselves, and their characters of Silent Bob and Jay respectively on the episodes. Smith was introduced on a talk show where he mentioned he was location scouting for his new movie. The show was called "Caitlin Ryan's Local Heroes".

questions.text: What type of music did Smith ask Jake to provide for his movie?
questions.explanation:
Emo.

	Craig Manning, played by Jake Epstein, was a bipolar teen who went to Degrassi and was the son of Caitlin Ryan's boyfriend. Craig was on set at the talk show and Kevin Smith offered him an opportunity to write a song for the movie.

questions.text: Which student was dating a former Degrassi teacher?
questions.explanation:
Paige.

	Paige was dating a former teacher, Matt. That had been a story line that ran through most of season 4. He had been fired in an earlier episode, though their relationship was legal because he was only a couple years older than her.

questions.text: Paige broke her leg on the last day of school.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She switched her spot on the cheer squad with Manny. The squad then dropped Paige during the ceremony and she broke her right leg. Manny then ended up wearing the same dress as Paige to the prom that night.  Kevin Smith, who was still location scouting, ended up attending the prom with Caitlin Ryan. In the real world, Smith had had a crush on the character of Caitlin from when he first saw the original "Degrassi" series many years earlier.

Jimmy.

	Jimmy, played by Aubrey Graham, had been shot earlier in the year and was in a wheel chair.  Graham would later gain notoriety as the rapper Drake. Manny was named his queen. While she was on stage accepting the award Paige purposely tripped and ripped Manny's dress off.

questions.text: Who did Manny ask to dance at prom?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	Toby had a crush on Manny and had asked her to the prom earlier in the episode. Manny had no interest in the nerdy Toby. She asked him to dance as "extra penance" for her role in breaking Paige's leg.

questions.text: Paige rigged the election for Prom Queen.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She didn't hand in her ballot right away like she was supposed to. Instead she went down and made photo copies and wrote Manny's name on all of them. This was so she could humiliate her during the award ceremony.

questions.text: Who announced to Craig that he/she was moving to England?
questions.explanation:
Ashley.

	She told him twice, once early in the episode before Craig told her that they would be writing a song for the movie, and again after they played the prom. She told him that she had nothing left to prove and wanted to try new challenges. Plus she had wanted to go to England since she was a child.
